phrases: Zankoku na tenshi no youni Like an angel without a sense of mercy...
Shonen yo shinwa ni nare...rise young boy to the heavens as a legend.
Aoi kaze ga i am about to Cold winds, as blue as the sea...
Tear open the door to your heart...
But unknowing you seem, just staring at me...
Sotto fureru mono Desperate for something to touch...
Motomeru koto ni muchu de A moment of kindness like that in a dream..
Your innocent eyes as yet have no idea...
Itaikena hitomi...of the path your destiny will follow.
But someday you will become aware of...
Sono senaka niwa...everything that you have got behind you.
Your wings are for seeking out...
Hanega arukoto...a new future that only you can search for.
Madobe kara yagate tobitatsu...through a portal like your pulsing blood.
Hotobashiru atsui pathos de If you should betray the chapel of your memories...
Omoide wo uragiru nara...the cruel angel will enter the window of your soul.
So boy, stand tall and embrace the fire of legend...
Embrace the universe like a blazing star!
Hey, Shinji, did you change the soup stock?
It is a gift from Ritsuko.
Do you always think you are to blame?
Do you always think you are to blame?
Shinji, apologies are your conditioned reflex
Now, now, that is just his way.
It is so easy to just accept his pathetic habits, is not it?!
But have not you been a little too easy on Shinji lately?
Maybe you and Kaji have hooked up again,
Maybe you and Kaji have hooked up again,
but the fact that you are happy does not mean you can ignore us.
There is nothing between Kaji and me.
Hey, Katsuragi, I have found a bar that serves a decent drink.
I have never seen anyone involved in such an indecent relationship!
You are supposed to be our guardian!
Projected adjustment values have been cleared.
Yeah, for a lot of private reasons.
Well, how is the Third Child doing?
I hope that knowing this will boost his confidence.
Misato, how were my test scores?
He beat us so easily that it is pissing me off!
He is great, wonderful, awesome, too awesome!
So that makes our job a little easier, right?
But it also means we will have to do our best to not be left behind.
Convenient to the Bashar, used books and video game stores...
Five minutes until evacuation of the Western District is completed.
Target is advancing slowly at two point five kilometers per hour.
It just suddenly appeared directly above us.
A situation like this and Commander Ikari's not here.
I have sent you all of the target's data.
This is all we know right now.
Approach it carefully and observe its reactions,
and, if possible, lure it outside of the city limits.
Two of you will back up the other, got that?
All right, Madam, but I think Shinji ought to take the point.
Well, this is a job for the highest rated, bravest,
Or do not you feel up to it, Shinji?
I will show you how it ought to be done, Asuka.
Hey, you two cut it out.
Is not that what you said, Misato?
Combat is a man's job, after all.
Unit 00 will back him up as well.
I cannot believe those kids are doing this without my orders.
Shinji's getting more manly, is not he?
No, I am going to have to chew him out when he gets back.
You might just be a good teacher.
Ayanami, Asuka, are you in position yet?
You know an Eva cannot move that fast.
You know an Eva cannot move that fast.
I will have to stop it myself.
You idiot, what are you doing?!
You idiot, what are you doing?!
He can get an A on a test but not in the real world.
Unit 01 and Ikari are still in there.
They reeled the umbilical cable back in,
but the other end was missing.
There is not much energy in the internal batteries.
If Shinji does not waste it groping blindly in the dark,
if he stays in the most minimal life-support mode,
then he can survive for sixteen hours.
Hold your current positions and stand-by.
Sub laser circuit has been opened.
The UN forces have completely surrounded it.
It stopped spreading once it reached a diameter of 600 meters.
By the way, is there a use for those ground troops?
They are supposed to allow us to apply pressure.
Taking matters into his own hands, defying Operations.
He got what he was asking for.
Just because he got a little better score than mine,
he had to go and show me how it ought to be done.
Are my comments about Shinji pissing you off?
Do you pilot Eva just for the praise of others?
No, I do not need anybody's approval but my own!
Yes, he acted arbitrarily and without consultation.
So, I will just have to punish him when he comes back.
I never thought sleeping could be this exhausting.
No radar or sonar reflections at all.
This space must be too big.
It is been twelve hours since I switched to life-support mode.
My life will end in four or five hours.
So, that shadow is actually the Angel's body?
It is six hundred eighty meters in diameter
with a thickness of three nanometers.
Sustained within that ultra-thin space is an inverted AT Field.
Abstract mathematics defines the region within as a Sea of Dirac.
It could be connected to another universe.
It disappears when the imaginary circuit of the body closes.
The object in the sky is only a shadow.
So the black shadow that swallowed Unit 01 is the target.
Then there is no way that we can fight it.
The purification system is breaking down.
Why cannot I open this lock?
Misato, tell me what is going on!
It is the only possibility that might work.
We would drop all 992 existing N2 mines into its center,
while simultaneously activating the AT Fields of the other Evas
disrupting the circuit enclosing the Angel's pocket interior.
If we concentrate enough power into the same microsecond,
we might destroy the Angel and the Dirac Sea that makes it up.
But the damage to the Eva would be...
What kind of rescue operation is this?
This operation's priority is to recover the Eva itself.
That the body may be damaged or destroyed has no bearing.
The pilot's life is not our concern.
If Shinji's lost, it is your fault.
Why are you and Commander Ikari so worried about Unit 01?
What in the hell is an Eva?
I have given you all the information.
I am taking command of this entire operation.
Forward all flights to Kansai International Airport.
Contact Air Traffic Control and the JADF's Air Transport divisions.
The Second Impact, the Instrumentality Project, Adam...
There are so many secrets that I am in the dark about.
The self has always been composed of two selves.
Yes, the self which is observed and the self which observes itself.
To expound, the Shinji Ikari that exists in your mind
There is also the Shinji Ikari in Misato Katsuragi's mind,
the Shinji Ikari in Asuka Sohryu's mind,
the Shinji Ikari in Rei Ayanami's mind,
and the Shinji Ikari in Gendou Ikari's mind.
but each of them is a true Shinji Ikari.
Your fear is of the Shinji Ikari's who exist in the minds of others.
I am just afraid of being hated.
You are afraid of being hurt.
No, I am the one who is bad.
Do you always think you are to blame?
No, you just believe that you are worthless.
Do not you trust your father?
I thought I hated my father, but now I am not sure.
My father called me by my name.
I was praised by my father!
Will you spend your life regurgitating
and re-digesting those few pleasant memories?
If I trust their words, it is enough to keep me alive.
Even though you know you are deceiving yourself?
If you will not believe that you can change yourself,
you will be unable to continue.
This world is filled with too much pain and suffering to keep going.
Humans are not made to float!
I do not care what you want to call it!
You have been shutting your eyes to that which you wished to avoid.
His sister was injured during the incident.
Who cares what the others say?!
No, I do not want to hear this!
You are running from reality again.
No one can justify life by linking happy moments into a rosary.
I have found something I can do to feel good.
In theory, the entry plug's energy reserves
should be reaching their expiration point.
The plug suit's life support system will be getting close to redline.
Advance the schedule by twelve minutes.
Let us do it while there is a chance that Shinji's still alive.
It was really yourself that you ran away from.
He may be guilty of killing his own wife.
Shinji, you must not run away.
The heating and the oxygen circulation are already out.
It is useless, the suit is giving out too.
Well, that is good for you.
Evas are in position and standing by.
AT Fields are ready to generate.
T-minus sixty seconds to mine drop.
T-minus sixty seconds to mine drop.
All meters and gauges are going off the scale.
But we have not done anything yet.
Unit 01 's power level has to be at zero.
My God, what kind of monster have we copied from?
I know that the Evas are not just copies of the first Angel.
But what is NERV going to do with them
once all the Angels have been destroyed?
I just wanted to see them again.
Did not you say you were going to punish him?
I have never seen the Eva looking as horrible as it did today.
Are the Evas really on our side?
I think that Major Katsuragi may have noticed something.
If Rei or Shinji were to find out the Eva's secrets,
We will take care of everything.
Well, that is good for you.
Eva Unit 04 under development in Nevada, explodes...
The old men of Seele modify their scenario themselves and the Fourth Child is selected.
